ghosts.description: La Banshee est une chasseuse naturelle et attaquera n’importe quoi. Elle est connu pour traquer une personne à la fois jusqu’à ce qu’elle soit tuée.
ghosts.name: Banshee
ghosts.strengths: Une Banshee ne ciblera qu’une personne à la fois.
ghosts.weaknesses: Les Banshees craignent le Crucifix et seront moins agressives à proximité d’un crucifix.

ghosts.description: A Démon is one of the worst Ghosts you can encounter. It has been known to attack without a reason.
ghosts.name: Démon
ghosts.strengths: Démons will attack more often than any other Ghost.
ghosts.weaknesses: Asking a Démon successful questions on the Ouija Board won't lower the user's sanity.

ghosts.description: Using a video camera is the only way to view a Goryo, when it passes through a DOTS projector.
ghosts.name: Goryo
ghosts.strengths: A Goryo will usually only show itself on camera is there are no people nearby.
ghosts.weaknesses: They are rarely seen far from their place of death.

ghosts.description: A rare ghost that can be found in hot climates. They are known to attack more often in cold weather.
ghosts.name: Hantu

ghosts.description: A Jinn is a territorial ghost that will attack when threatened. It has also been known to be able to travel at significant speed.
ghosts.name: Jinn
ghosts.strengths: A Jinn will travel at a faster speed if its victim is far away.
ghosts.weaknesses: Turning off the locations power source will prevent the Jinn from using its ability.

ghosts.description: A Mare is the source of all nightmares, making it most powerful in the dark.
ghosts.name: Mare
ghosts.strengths: A Mare will have an increased chance to attack in the dark.
ghosts.weaknesses: Turning the lights on around the Mare will lower its chance to attack.

ghosts.description: A Myling is a very vocal and active ghost. They are rumoured to be quiet when hunting their prey.
ghosts.name: Myling
ghosts.strengths: A Myling is known to be quieter when hunting.
ghosts.weaknesses: Mylings more frequently make paranormal sounds.

ghosts.description: Oni's are a cousin to the Démon and possess extreme strength. There have been rumours that they become more active around their prey.
ghosts.name: Oni
ghosts.strengths: Oni's are more active when people are nearby and have been seen moving objects at great speed.
ghosts.weaknesses: Being more active make the Oni easier to find and identify.

ghosts.description: A Phantom is a ghost that can possess the living, most commonly summoned by a Ouija Board. It also induces fear into those around it.
ghosts.name: Phantom
ghosts.strengths: Looking at a Phantom will considerably drop your sanity.
ghosts.weaknesses: Taking a photo of the Phantom will make it temporarily disappear.

ghosts.description: One of the most famous Ghosts, a Poltergeist, also known as a noisy ghost can manipulate objects around it to spread fear into its victims.
ghosts.name: Poltergeist
ghosts.strengths: A Poltergeist can throw huge amounts of objects at once.
ghosts.weaknesses: A Poltergeist is almost ineffective in an empty room.

ghosts.description: A Revenant is a slow but violent ghost that will attack indiscriminately. It has been rumoured to travel at a significantly high speed when hunting.
ghosts.name: Revenant
ghosts.strengths: A Revenant will travel at a significantly faster speed when hunting a victim.
ghosts.weaknesses: Hiding from the Revenant will cause it to move very slowly.

ghosts.description: A Shade is known to be a Shy Ghost. There is evidence that a Shade will stop all paranormal activity if there are multiple people nearby.
ghosts.name: Shade
ghosts.strengths: Being shy means the Ghost will be harder to find.
ghosts.weaknesses: The Ghost will not enter hunting mode if there is multiple people nearby.

ghosts.description: A Spirit is the most common Ghost you will come across however it is still very powerful and dangerous. They are usually discovered at one of their hunting grounds after an unexplained death.
ghosts.name: Spirit
ghosts.weaknesses: Using Smudge Sticks on a spirit will stop it attacking for a long period of time.

ghosts.description: A wraith is one of the most dangerous ghosts you will find. It is also the only known Ghost that has the ability of flight and has sometimes been known to travel through walls.
ghosts.name: Wraith
ghosts.strengths: Wraiths almost never touch the ground meaning it can't be tracked by footsteps.
ghosts.weaknesses: Wraiths have a toxic reaction to Salt.

ghosts.description: A common type of ghost that is attracted to human voices. They can usually be found haunting family homes.
ghosts.name: Yokai
ghosts.strengths: Talking near a Yokai will anger it and increase its chance of attacking.
ghosts.weaknesses: When hunting, a Yokai can only hear voices close to it.

ghosts.description: A Yurei is a Ghost that has returned to the physical world, usually for the purpose of revenge or hatred.
ghosts.name: Yurei
ghosts.strengths: Yurei's have been known to have a stronger effect on people sanity.
ghosts.weaknesses: Smudging the Yurei's room will cause it to not wander around the location for a long time.
